name: 3dAFNItoNIML
author: RWCox
description: Dumps AFNI dataset header information to stdout in NIML format. Mostly for debugging and testing purposes!

inputs.description: Also put the data into the output (will be huge).
inputs.name: Data flag

inputs.description: Format in ASCII, not binary (even huger).
inputs.name: ASCII flag

inputs.description: Instead of stdout, send the dataset to a socket. Implies '-data' as well.
inputs.name: TCP host:port
